tweet: Shopping the farms for fresh cigars.
I am enjoying Nicaraguan evening on edge of tobacco field.
It has been a long day, as I lay in this hacienda I can smell the tobacco, that's a lullaby in itself.
Made a side trip to a coffee plantation in Costa Rica, tropical mountains, tropical sun, great coffee and a nice cigar, great Sunday.
Definitely drank too much Costa Rican coffee today. The coffee fields are a site.
